channel.title: News on Minkyoung Cho
channel.description: Recent content in News on Minkyoung Cho

item.title: TC-LoRA Accepted to NeurIPSW'25
item.description: TC-LoRA is a new paradigm that enables dynamic context-aware control by conditioning the model’s weights directly.

item.title: SCORPION Accepted to IROS'25
item.description: We propose a robust, holistic 3D perception framework in a collaborative setting among multiple AVs.

item.title: CrowdMap Accepted to CVPRW'25
item.description: We introduce the global vectorized HD map construction task in a collaborative setting among multiple AV agents.

item.title: Internship at NVIDIA: Round 2!
item.description: Thrilled to return to the NVIDIA Metropolis team, this time diving into Generative AI research!

item.title: Cocoon Accepted to ICLR'25
item.description: Cocoon is a new object- and feature-level uncertainty-aware multimodal fusion framework designed for 3D OD tasks.

item.title: Our Paper Accepted to ACM CSCS'24
item.description: This survey paper on AV security and safety has been developed in collaboration with the AV reading group at UMich.

item.title: Start Internship at NVIDIA
item.description: Will be working as a Deep Learning Software Intern at NVIDIA Metropolis team!

item.title: ADoPT Accepted to BMVC'23
item.description: ADoPT is a cutting-edge defense mechanism against LiDAR spoofing attacks, leveraging point-level temporal consistency.
